title: The Pilgrim
description:
For you making art is holy, like a prayer. But one question keeps you up at night: What if artists are … like saints? What if you can’t choose to be one – you can only be chosen?

Hosted by Robbie Daymond. 

Listen ad-free on Wondery+ here

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
